user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, well-fitting socks that would support my activities without causing discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable and performance-oriented socks that would fit well and enhance my overall experience during physical activities. However, the product did not meet my expectations in terms of size and comfort, leading to disappointment.

I sought high-quality socks that would provide comfort and durability, especially around the ankle area. Unfortunately, the fit was too tight, which detracted from the overall comfort I was hoping for.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, good fit, and quality materials. I value items that are well-constructed and provide a reliable performance, such as shirts that stay tucked in and socks that fit well without cutting off circulation. I also appreciate innovative features that enhance usability, like adjustable belts that allow for easy size changes. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that are poorly designed or uncomfortable, particularly those that pinch or restrict movement, such as shoes or socks with tight bands. Overall, I look for practicality and comfort in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable, well-fitting socks that can support my activities without causing discomfort. within my expected price range: [18.49, 21.0]
What specific activities do you plan to do while wearing these socks to ensure they provide the right support and comfort for your needs?

I usually engage in activities like running, hiking, and cycling where I need socks that can provide good cushioning, moisture-wicking properties, and a snug fit to prevent blisters and ensure comfort during movement.
What materials do you prefer in your socks to ensure they have good cushioning, moisture-wicking properties, and a snug fit for running, hiking, and cycling activities?

I prefer socks made from high-quality materials like moisture-wicking fabrics such as merino wool or synthetic blends. These materials provide good cushioning, help with moisture management, and offer a snug fit that's essential for running, hiking, and cycling activities.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <BERING Men's Ankle Athletic Socks for Running, Hiking, Cycling (6 Pairs)> / Item ID: B096LM9TZV / Price: $17.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Sport Specific Clothing', 'Running', 'Men', 'Socks'] / Description: ["BERING Men's Athletic Ankle Socks are made from a soft, light, durable and comfortable fit. Moisture wicking, anti-slip, no blisters, good stretch and long-lasting. Breathable mesh for ventilation. Cushioned sole, arch support and keep the sock in place. Reinforced heel and toe for durability. Perfect for workout, running, walking, tennis, hiking, training, golf, cycling, and casual."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <EnerWear 4 Pack Women's Merino Wool Outdoor Hiking Trail Crew Sock> / Item ID: B0989H2QK8 / Price: $19.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Athletic Socks'] / Description: ['Enerwear Ladies Wool Trail Socks are in full cushion and reinforced at heel and toe for maximum comfort and durability.The socks offer moisture management fiber at the sole and maintains a cushioned feeling throughout. The breathable mesh supports your insteps, bringing maximum comfort and support all the time.Washing with clean water with ordinary temperatures.Machine washable, but we suggest be hand-washed to maintain exceptional feel. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Do not iron. Do not dry clean.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <FoxRiver Outdoor Wick Dry Alturas Ultra-Lightweight Liner Socks> / Item ID: B00IQF06XC / Price: $5.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Athletic Socks'] / Description: ["These crew liners with Wick Dry technology keep feet dry, avoiding the moisture build up that causes blisters. Sizing: Small (Men's 3-5.5 Women's 4-6.5); Medium (Shoe Sizes: Men's 6-8.5; Women's 7-9.5); Large (\xa0Shoe Sizes: Men's 9-11.5; Women's 10-12.5), X-large( Men's 12-14.5)."]
